## Setup

Recommended: Use Python 3.12 to avoid building native wheels (e.g., msgspec) on newer Python versions.

```
# On Windows with py launcher (if Python 3.12 is installed):
py -3.12 -m venv .venv
.venv\\Scripts\\Activate.ps1
python -m pip install --upgrade pip wheel
python -m pip install -r requirements.txt

# If you don't have Python 3.12, install it first:
# winget install -e --id Python.Python.3.12
# or download from https://www.python.org/downloads/release/python-3120/
```

## Run

```
python -m .client
```

## Services

Start services to register agents, functions, and workflows:

```
python -c "import asyncio; from .services import start_services; asyncio.run(start_services())"
```
